languages.text: Благословенная гидравлическая установка Адептус Механикус взорвет жадные недра и освободит бесценные минералы, столь нужные Империуму.
The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.
languages.original_text: Благословенная гидравлическая установка Адептус Механикус взорвет жадные недра и освободит бесценные минералы, столь нужные Империуму.

traits.locale_text: The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.
The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the earth's greedy bowels and free the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.
The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.

The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.

languages.text: L'installation hydraulique bénie de l'Adeptus Mechanicus broiera les entrailles avares de la terre pour en libérer les minerais inestimables dont l'Imperium a désespérément besoin.
languages.original_text: The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.

traits.locale_text: L'installation hydraulique bénie de l'Adeptus Mechanicus broiera les entrailles avares de la terre pour en libérer les minerais inestimables dont l'Imperium a désespérément besoin.

languages.text: 帝国技術局の祝福された油圧装置により、貪欲な惑星の底を砕き、帝国が切実に必要としている貴重な鉱物を手に入れることができる。
languages.original_text: The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局の祝福された油圧装置により、貪欲な惑星の底を砕き、帝国が切実に必要としている貴重な鉱物を手に入れることができる。

languages.text: 机械修会的神圣液压装置将会碾碎富饶的行星岩层，开采出帝国迫切需要的珍贵矿藏。
languages.original_text: The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的神圣液压装置将会碾碎富饶的行星岩层，开采出帝国迫切需要的珍贵矿藏。

languages.text: La bendita instalación hidráulica del Adeptus Mechanicus aplastará las codiciosas entrañas de la tierra, liberando en su interior los minerales de valor incalculable que el Imperium necesita tan desesperadamente.
languages.original_text: The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.

traits.locale_text: La bendita instalación hidráulica del Adeptus Mechanicus aplastará las codiciosas entrañas de la tierra, liberando en su interior los minerales de valor incalculable que el Imperium necesita tan desesperadamente.

languages.text: Die gesegnete hydraulische Installation des Adeptus Mechanicus wird die gierige Unterwelt der Erde aushöhlen und die wertvollen Mineralien befreien, auf die das Imperium so dringend angewiesen ist.
languages.original_text: The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.

traits.locale_text: Die gesegnete hydraulische Installation des Adeptus Mechanicus wird die gierige Unterwelt der Erde aushöhlen und die wertvollen Mineralien befreien, auf die das Imperium so dringend angewiesen ist.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus'un mukaddes hidrolik makineleri, doyumsuz toprağın karnını deşerek bünyesinde sakladığı paha biçilmez mineralleri çıkaracak ve İmparatorluk'un ihtiyaçlarını karşılayacak.
languages.original_text: The blessed hydraulic installation of the Adeptus Mechanicus will crush the greedy bowels of the earth, freeing the priceless minerals within that the Imperium so desperately needs.
